TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventLevel extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains an event level that is defined in an event provider. The level signifies the severity of the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class cannot be instantiated. A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.ProviderMetadata> object defies a list of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLevel> objects, one for each level defined in the provider. The standard level values and their meanings are defined in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventLevel> enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the localized name for the event level. The name describes what severity level of events this level is used for.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the localized name for the event level.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the non-localized name of the event level.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the non-localized name of the event level.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As Integer
public: property int Value { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the numeric value of the event level.
